content:
I'm happy to help! Unfortunately, I don't have any information about your meal planning or grocery shopping, as we didn't discuss it earlier. I'm a blank slate!

If you want to try to jog your memory, I can ask some questions to help. What type of ingredients did you buy on Wednesday? Were they for a specific cuisine or dish? Do you remember any specific items you purchased?

Feel free to share any details you can recall, and I'll do my best to help you figure out what you were planning to make for Thursday's lunch!
